channel.title: Making the server online
channel.description:
Before christmas, I was making a server everything worked. I downloaded No-ip and did what i needed to do on that side, and I put my server online without portforwarding this only alloud people connected the internet I was connected to, This is what i wanted just so I could edit my server and see what I needed to add or fix.
Now I have a new computer and I'v done the same but when I tick the box on No-ip and click 'Run' In my server files, It says ''Error Connected To Server'' On the client log-in page.
How do I get it online just for my internet use (Without Portforwarding) ?
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Making the server online
item.dc:creator: @nathan0507 nathan0507
item.description:
@nathan0507 wrote:

Before christmas, I was making a server everything worked. I downloaded No-ip and did what i needed to do on that side, and I put my server online without portforwarding this only alloud people connected the internet I was connected to, This is what i wanted just so I could edit my server and see what I needed to add or fix.

Now I have a new computer and I’v done the same but when I tick the box on No-ip and click ‘Run’ In my server files, It says ‘‘Error Connected To Server’’ On the client log-in page.

How do I get it online just for my internet use (Without Portforwarding) ?

Thanks in advance.
